alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 16 at 7:56PM CST until December 21 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. For the Upper Pearl River...including Philadelphia, Edinburg, Carthage, Walnut Grove, Lena, Kosciusko, Ratliff`s Ferry, Ofahoma, Jackson...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING TO WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River At Edinburg. * WHEN...From Saturday evening to Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Minor over bank flooding continues in areas south of the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM CST Friday the stage was 17.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening to a crest of 22.0 feet early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Pearl River Edinburg 20.0 17.4 Fri 6 pm CST 19.4 21.8 21.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 900 AM CST.
